name: ruby-agent-skills (DmitryPogrebnoy)
description: [项目级] A collection of Agent Skills designed for efficient work with Ruby type signatures, including RBS, Sorbet, and other typing systems。来源: https://github.com/DmitryPogrebnoy/ruby-agent-skills

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content: This plugin provides four **model-invoked skills** and one **agent** for working with Ruby type signatures.

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
Gemfile
LICENSE
README.md
Rakefile
THIRD_PARTY_LICENSES.md
lib
lib/generate_plugins.rb
lib/http_client.rb
lib/rbs_comments_stripper.rb
lib/rbs_examples_downloader.rb
lib/rbs_inline_examples_downloader.rb
lib/sorbet_examples_downloader.rb
lib/sorbet_rbi_examples_downloader.rb
plugins
plugins/ruby-type-signature-skills

genes.title: 使用方法
genes.content:
Generate RBS signatures for lib/user.rb
Add inline Sorbet signatures to app/models/
Update type signatures for changed files
